name: Epson Projector Monitoring
description: Epson Projector Monitoring. This script will generate actions for powering on and off the projector and variables for Power Status and Lamp Hour, showing the current status of the projector and the number of hours the lamp has been used.The script uses the PJLink protocol Version 1.04 to communicate with the projector. The PJLink protocol is a standard protocol for controlling and monitoring projectors over a network. It allows users to check the status of the projector, control its power state, and retrieve information about the lamp usage.(https://pjlink.jbmia.or.jp/english/data/5-1_PJLink_eng_20131210.pdf)
